reviewText:
the look for atlantis bogs the mind...this movie seems to make me believe it more...hope on day they actually do find it and is proven to be atlantis....

great filming..good informative...all in all great buy....
Used this with 2nd graders studying Atlantis.  They loved it.  I thought it was often over their heads. Lots of interesting background.

This documentary is good, interesting but you won't learn anything new. It's the "basic stuff", things you can easily find on the internet or that I have seen in other documentaries. In a way this documentary is only a recent version of the "In Search Of..." episode of the 70's, so nothing new.
